item.description:
Meeting Description: From the Scarlet Oak Website: "The Tavern is located on Hingham's historic Main Street in a 250-year old colonial house thoroughly restored and updated by the award-winning Niemitz Design Group. The cuisine led by Culinary Director K.C. O'Hara centers around steaks, although we also offer contemporary versions of classic American comfort food."

Their Tavern Menu has the following starters: Smokey Salted Almonds, House Cured Olives and Homemade Focaccia, Oven Fired Blue Crab and Sharp Cheddar Dip, Garlicky Shrimp, Kettle Beef Sliders, Scarlet Salad and classic Ceasar salad. The bar area is a cozy section with fireplace and comfortable leather furniture.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: The Scarlet Oak is located within sight of the intersection of Rt 228 and Rt 53 (Queen Anne's Corner). From Rt 3, take Exit 14 and head East on Rt 228 towards Hingham/Nantasket. Follow Rt 228 for 1/2 mile to the intersection with Rt 53 - this will be the first traffic light you come to. Go straight through the intersection and The Scarlet Oak will be immediately on your left.
item.how_to_find_us: A Meetup sign will be on the table in the Bar area...
item.why: Easy going and friendly people will be there...

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Another Appetizer and Drinks event
